page.title: 03A HOUNSLOW POLICEMAN'S LOT
page.content: I joined the Police Force when I was 20 years old,you have to be at least 5ft 8ins tall.We have 56 policemen and 8 women plus 2 dogs at Brentford Police Station working 4 shifts.I use a bike to cover my beat of 1 sq.mile and a walkie-talkie to keep in contact We also have 3 cars(panda's),1 Sherpa van for prisoners and 1 Rover pursuit car.We can get horses for crowd control.I arrest about 1 person in a month but there are 2500 arrested in a year locally.Most only for a few hours My purpose is not really to catch criminals,I liase with the community. We organise a Schools Disco competion and 5-a-side football.I never carry a gun and never will.I keep fit by playing badminton and squash.I have a dog at home.Police dogs are trained for obedience for 26 weeks in Kent with their handler.
